text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki stuns the audience at the<n>Yayoi Sho,
and expectations for her to<n>claim the Classic
Triple Crown rise even<n>higher.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She begins training even harder than<n>ever to meet
those expectations. I'm<n>touched by her
dedication and plan a<n>surprise to reward her hard
work.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I want to give her a star, so I attempt<n>sleight of
hand to conjure a brooch<n>shaped like the evening
star...<n>Unfortunately, my trick ends in failure.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Despite my fumbling, Fuji Kiseki is still<n>touched
by my gesture. At last, next up<n>for us is the
Satsuki Sho.
